metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5929 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
QOS.ch Logback before 1.2.0 has a serialization vulnerability affecting theSocketServer and ServerSocketReceiver components.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5929` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblogback-java - 1:1.2.3-2ubuntu1~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: logback package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.3-2ubuntu1~18.04.1').
